name: definably
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that can be clearly explained and described: His definably northern singing voice is part of a long tradition. Without saying anything definably humorous, they always manage to raise a laugh.
More examplesFewer examplesSome speakers from that era use both of these words in definably different ways.What is it that marks a writer as definably American?His works were largely eclipsed by those of younger men or more definably radical ones.He has succeeded in adapting the music to a sound that is definably his own.
